Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Cataclysmal \Cat`a*clys"mal\, Cataclysmic \Cat`a*clys"mic\, a. Of or pertaining to a cataclysm. [1913 Webster]
cataclysmic adj : severely destructive; "cataclysmic nuclear war"; "a cataclysmic earthquake" [syn: {cataclysmal}]
